tool_description: Translate a Shopify product to any language from the product url.
name: Shopify Translate
title: Shopify Translate

api_list.name: Translate product
api_list.description: Translate a Shopify product to any language from the product url.

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description: The language code column uses ISO 639-1 two-digit language codes. af, sq, am, ar, hy, az, bn, bs, bg, ca, zh, zh-TW, hr, cs, da, fa-AF, nl, en, et, fa, tl, fi, fr, fr-CA, ka, de, el, gu, ht, ha, he, hi, hu, is, id, ga, it, ja, kn, kk, ko, lv, lt, mk, ms, ml, mt, mr, mn, no, ps, pl, pt, pt-PT, pa, ro, ru, sr, si, sk, sl, so, es, es-MX, sw, sv, ta, te, th, tr, uk, ur, uz, vi, cy

optional_parameters.name: from
